Title: Argo
Overview: As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador.
Tagline: The movie was fake. The mission was real.
Keywords: cia, wife husband relationship, document, revolution, hiding place, canadian, press conference, biography, hanged man, american abroad, crane, subtitled scene, movie poster, based on article, extraction, iran hostage crisis, sweatshop, intelligence agent, film studio, langley virginia, 1980s
production_companies: GK Films, Warner Bros., Smokehouse Pictures
Cast: Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin
